localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: It's easy: go on the map, tap on another user, and send them a request for a photo! Gallery uploads are not allowed, so any photo they send will be taken on the spot, which means extra fresh photos on delivery!
blogPost.body: It's easy: go on the map, tap on another user, and send them a request for a photo! Gallery uploads are not allowed, so any photo they send will be taken on the spot, which means extra fresh photos on delivery!
blogPost.title: Looxie - Location-based photo requests
blogPost.author: Antonis Tsagaris

localize.description: 这很简单：在地图上点击另一个用户，然后向他们发送照片请求！画廊上传是不允许的，所以他们发送的任何照片都将被当场拍摄，这意味着在交付时会有额外的新鲜照片！
這很簡單：在地圖上點擊另一個用戶，然後向他們發送照片請求！畫廊上傳是不允許的，所以他們發送的任何照片都將被當場拍攝，這意味着在交付時會有額外的新鮮照片！

next.excerpt: Imagine selling off all those annual subscriptions you don't use anymore and can't refund. We help you do exactly that. In a nutshell - unloved is a platform for buying and selling pre-owned tech subscriptions.
next.title: unloved - marketplace for pre-owned tech subscriptions

localize.description: 想象一下，卖掉所有你不再使用的年度订阅，而且不能退款。我们帮助您做到这一点。简而言之，无人喜爱是一个买卖二手科技订阅的平台。
想象一下，賣掉所有你不再使用的年度訂閱，而且不能退款。我們幫助您做到這一點。簡而言之，無人喜愛是一個買賣二手科技訂閱的平臺。
